BadgeDetail.Name: Market Research
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge is able to perform market research to test a business idea. They are identify and analyse their target market to understand their motivators and demotivators and assess the competition. They can use appropriate methods to capture qualitative and quantitative customer feedback and critically analyse the resulting data to inform next steps.

Task.Title: Market research report
Task.Body: Upload a market research report showing evidence that identifies your target market demographics with their persona. Include evidence of primary research you have undertaken. This could include transcripts from focus groups or raw data from online questionnaires.
